title: Love Island's Cassie Lansdell breaks down in tears to new girl Isabelle Green
text:
She's the feisty Love Island star who has been involved in a rocky romance with Luke Packham since his arrival as an intruder.

But Cassie Landsdell couldn't hide her emotions in a teaser for Sunday night's episode - as she broke down to 'Bomb Squad' babe Isabelle Green, after learning they had shared a steamy kiss together.

'I don't want to compete again!' Cassie said to Isabelle, before bursting into tears on the bed.

'I don't want to compete!' Cassie Lansdell broke down in tears to new girl Isabelle Green in a clip for Sunday night's episode - over her steamy kiss with Luke Packham

Luke and Cassie are currently coupled up, but their romance hit the rocks when they began arguing over how much effort they made with each other.

And when the 'Bomb Squad' of new girls arrived, it was no surprise that Luke's head turned for blonde beauty Isabelle - with the pair later sharing a steamy snog in bed.

Cassie is set to discuss the smooch with Isabelle on Sunday's episode, asking: 'He said you guys kissed? Was it like, a long kiss?'

Breaking point: Cassie couldn't help but get emotional when discussing the drama, saying she felt 'second best'

Happier times: Cassie was previously coupled up with Luke Packham (right), but his head was turned when the 'bomb squad' arrived

Isabelle responded: 'It wasn't super long... he initiated it. Yeah, literally even today, he was like... I don't know what I'm going to do.'

Unconvinced, Cassie responded: 'I dont know, it's all sounding a bit suss. I've had to move around quite alot here, it's not been easy for me.'

'I'm getting emotional,' she continued, trying to fight back her tears. 'I don't want to have to compete.'

'It wasn't super long' Isabelle recalled the steamy bedroom kiss she shared with Luke to a mortified Cassie

Earlier in the episode, Luke said he was 'torn' between Isabelle and Cassie, and wouldn't know who to choose if he had to recouple.

Speaking in the beach hut, Cassie said: 'It's not really a very nice feeling, knowing that the guy you were into, and you were waiting for him, has gone and kissed someone else.

'I'm not going to lie, it made me feel like s**t. Again, I felt like second best.'
description: Love Island's Cassie Landsdell couldn't hide her emotions in a teaser for Sunday night's episode - as she broke down in tears to new girl Isabelle Green, after learning she kissed Luke Packham.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
